summary: Based on the Swearing Mudcrabs mod, This is a mod to have your very own Swearing mudcrab!
descriptionHtml:
Based on the Swearing Mudcrabs mod, This is a mod to have your very own Swearing mudcrab! This mod replaces all dogs in Skyrim with Mudcrabs, therefore allowing you to have one as a companion! Enjoy your new companion as he or she curses you to hell!
=========================Installation==================================
to install simply extract the data folder to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

credits to Andokool12 for the swearing mudcrab sounds.
enjoy! 
==========================Video=====================================
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZncyDevqHU&context=C375a1b7ADOEgsToPDskJB3DCoo-Td2XdFBrKDM_rv
author: CHOCOLATEMALK
